vision: Allow users to create their own personalized developer dashboard with custom links, tools, and quick navigation shortcuts
goal: Users can add/edit/remove cards on the dashboard to build a productivity hub tailored to their workflow

key_questions.question: Where should card data be stored?
options: Supabase (user_dashboard_cards table) - Best for multi-device sync
Hybrid - Default cards in code, user cards in Supabase
key_questions.recommendation: Start with localStorage for MVP, migrate to Supabase for v2

key_questions.question: Should default cards be removable?
options: Yes - Full customization, users can remove anything
No - Keep core cards, only add custom ones
Restore defaults option - Allow removal with easy reset
key_questions.recommendation: Yes with restore defaults option - best of both worlds

key_questions.question: What level of customization for cards?
options: Basic - Just title, URL, icon selection from predefined set
Advanced - Custom icons (upload), card sizes, reordering
key_questions.recommendation: Start with Basic, iterate based on feedback

key_questions.question: Where should card management UI live?
options: Inline editing (click 'Edit' button, cards become editable)
key_questions.recommendation: Modal + long-press action (consistent with existing pattern)

key_questions.question: How should users select icons?
options: Icon picker modal with lucide-react icons
Emoji picker (simple, no icon library needed)
key_questions.recommendation: Start with emoji picker + lucide-react, add favicon auto-detect later

features: Add custom card button ('+' card in grid/list)
Simple form modal (title, URL, icon emoji/lucide)
Edit existing cards (via long-press action menu)
Keep all default cards (non-removable for now)
Advanced actions per card (multiple quick actions)

user_stories: As a developer, I want to add my Jira board link so I can quickly access my tasks
As a developer, I want to add my staging environment URL so I can test deployments
As a developer, I want to organize cards by project so I can find tools faster
As a developer, I want to remove cards I don't use so my dashboard is cleaner
As a developer, I want to reorder cards so my most-used tools are at the top
notes: Consider adding card usage analytics (most clicked) to suggest reordering
Think about mobile experience - adding cards on mobile should be easy
Look at Notion, Raycast, and similar tools for inspiration
Card actions (long-press menu) could include 'Edit', 'Delete', 'Duplicate', 'Move to category'
Consider 'Quick Add' flow: Just paste a URL and auto-populate title/icon
next_steps: User feedback: Show mockups, ask which features are most important
Test with various URL types (internal, external, localhost)
